div.em: Current conditions as of 26 Apr 13:53 pm CDT

div.span: Sunny, with a high near 64. North wind 10 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.
Mostly clear, with a low around 41. North wind around 5 mph becoming calm in the evening.
A 30 percent chance of showers, mainly before noon. Partly sunny, with a high near 65. South wind 6 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

div.div: Your session will expire in 0 minutes.

br.span:
10003 State Route 160
Trenton, IL 62293
(618) 224-7355
Fax: (618) 224-7085
Principal: Roger Freeze
freezer@wesclin.org

div.p: 4th and 5th Grade will start in the North Gym with orientation from 6:00-6:30pm, then visit classrooms from 6:30-7:15pm. Please enter through the north doors of the building.
6th-8th Grade will start in the South Gym with orientation from 6:45-7:15pm, then visit classrooms from 7:15-8:00pm. Please enter through the front doors, by the flagpole.
Please bring all school supplies that evening and drop them off in your homeroom and locker. Also, this is a reminder that all 5th-8th grade students must have a lock for their hallway locker.
